title: Reds retain Pena with one-year deal
subtitle: Reds retain outfielder Pena
body: First, the Reds cleared up a starting spot for Wily Mo Pena this offseason. Now they've signed him to a one-year deal. Pena and the Reds avoided arbitration by agreeing to a one-year contract worth $1.25 million on Sunday. The signing was the second of the day for the Reds, who announced an agreement with catcher Javier Valentin earlier in the day. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
